extendedInfo.description: Thinking of going surfing? Check out the waves before you go! Powered by spitcast.com, this great app will get you simple, accurate 7-day forecasts for surf spots up and down the CA coast. You'll get both the quality and height of the swells at your favorite beach! New for version 1.0 - ability to select 1-day, tomorrow, weekend, and weekly views for your surf reports.

reviews.title: No tides
reviews.comment: I don\'t see any tide information which is pretty much a requirement. Nice simple app otherwise.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Where\'s NorCal?
reviews.comment: App claims ALL Cal regions, but no Northern Cal at all! Nor Cal is not Marin and SF, they\'re Central Cal. True Nor Cal is: Del Norte, Humboldt, and Mendocino counties. App looks simple and cool, but don\'t claim ALL Cal when you don\'t have it. Add Nor Cal and I\'ll be back. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: To simple for me
reviews.comment: Works well on my LG Spectrum... only issue I have is you can\'t narrow future forcasts to narrowed window time frame, so this an app that works as an estimation. Not bad for FREE!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Looks good but...
reviews.comment: It\'s missing tide  change information. Otherwise it would be worth 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good information, needs improvements
reviews.comment: I like looking through this info before going to the beach, information seems accurate. One bug: sometimes interface glitches and ads jump rapidly from the bottom over the predictions and back. Very much needed 2x1 widget, it would go nicely with a 2x1 widgets from Hi Tide, Sun Surveyor and World Weather Clock
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Excellent. Use it for all my surfing needs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Solid App
reviews.comment: Gets the job done! Simple and easy to use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No north coast!!!
reviews.comment: Nothing north of marin county, much less Humboldt.  Not a true California surf report; now is it?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool beans
reviews.comment: Money
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty cool
reviews.comment: Gives 7day basic forcast. Does not give direction or anything about wind. But it appears the forecasting takes all that into consideration for each spot.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Spitcast!!
reviews.comment: This is what im talkin about! Great app, basic..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very limited information
reviews.comment: Seems accurate...but amount of info is limited and somewhat difficult to manuever. But did have some surf spots that were missing on other free apps...so it may be a worthwhile backup
reviews.author: Scott Wingate

reviews.title: Best app!
reviews.comment: This one is really cool!

reviews.title: great app!
reviews.comment: easy to use and very elegant.  the seven day forecast really helps you plan the week.
